My Projects

Pulsewave monitoring system for sub-health

It is a software for preventing subhealth disease, funded by the National College Students Innovative Training Program.

Digital long-scroll painting of the palace museum in Duanmen

It is a project cooperating with the Palace Museum in Beijing, using virtual reality and natural interaction techniques to exhibit Chinese famous ancient paintings

MingHuaJi website of the Palace Museum

It is a website for exhibiting several famous HD digital paintings of the Palace Museum, the link is here http://minghuaji.dpm.org.cn/
